name: Invasion of The Jelly-Aliens
description:
Aliens from the Jelly Planet took over the world.

Moon base is the last bastion of humanity.
And you're an ace pilot of earth's last tank battalion.

There's still hope.
If you somehow defeat the Jelly Alien's leader, Giant Shark Jelly,
Invasion would halt.

But Beware!
Even a slight touch with a Jelly Alien is leathal.
Try not to get caught in a swarm of Jelly.

A/D - Move
LMB - Shoot

---

8.14 21:17 - Fixed game breaking bug
